attributes.action: Respect is needed for those receiving care as much as it is for unpaid carers
attributes.additional_details: Why should people struggle with limited care from Social  Services but are allowed a family member to care for them 24/7 for just £59.75 Care Allowance and then you take it off our income support. We don't choose to be disabled or want these needs, so why should we fight for them? If you're disabled you should get your care needs met no matter what.
